text: In China , the hepatitis B surface antigen ( HBsAg ) seropositive rate for the general population ( between 1 and 59 years of age ) is 7 . 18 % ( 1 ) . Globally , there are ~ 93 million individuals with hepatitis B virus ( HBV ) infections , 20 million of which are chronic ( 2 ) . Hepatitis B is the most common risk factor for liver cirrhosis and hepatocellular carcinoma ( HCC ) , and the mortality of HBV - induced acute - on - chronic liver failure ( ACLF ) may exceed 60 % . HBV infections are not easy to cure , and the mechanisms of the virus are unclear , particularly with regard to protein expression and regulation function in the pathogenic process .
